title: Incorrect by-instance average gRPC duration
body:
## Bug Report

![图片](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17217495/140893095-6d1419d5-27d3-4876-8d13-8873e127a893.png)

The instance selection `{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$instance"}` is missing from the denominator in the expression for "Average gRPC message duration". So we will see incorrect duration when we select the instance.
